trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 비트맵 이미지의 크기 관련 특성을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에 정의 된 값에 따라 비트맵의 크기가 조정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> 빈 크기 조정 속성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>을&0;으로 설정 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>0으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: 에 전달 될 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, 입력이 출력와 동일 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> 소스 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지 하 고 초기 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*> 지정

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>의 값으로 설정 `pixelHeight`, 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>0으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵의 픽셀 높이입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 pixelHeight 가&0; 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> 소스 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지 하 고 초기 지정 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"> </xref> 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵 이미지에는 원래 가로 세로 비율과 크기 조정 유지 관리합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>속성의 값으로 설정 `rotation`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>0으로 설정 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>0으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: 적용할 초기 회전 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: 90도 증분만 지원 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> 소스 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지 하 고 초기 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*> 지정

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>을&0;으로 설정 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>의 값으로 설정 `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵의 픽셀 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelWidth is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 pixelWidth 가&0; 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> 원래 비트맵 가로 세로 비율을 유지 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵 이미지에 대 한 유효 크기 `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>로 설정 `false`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>의 값으로 설정 `pixelHeight`, 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>의 값으로 설정 `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵의 픽셀 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵의 픽셀 높이입니다.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 pixelHeight 가&0; 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 픽셀 비트맵 이미지의 높이입니다.

trans-unit.source: PixelHeight must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelHeight 유효 하려면&0; 보다 커야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 비트맵의 높이입니다.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 픽셀 비트맵 이미지의 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: PixelWidth must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelWidth 유효 하려면&0; 보다 커야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 비트맵의 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 원래 비트맵 이미지의 가로 세로 비율의 유지 여부를 결정 하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 경우 원래 가로 세로 비율 유지 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>비트맵에 대 한 최대 크기 값을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵의 너비 또는 높이가 지정 된 값과 일치 하도록 보장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: 가로 세로 비율은 유지 되지 않고, 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>을 모두 사용 하 고 해당 값을 사용 하도록 비트맵을 늘립니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>원래 가로 세로 비율 유지 되는; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 비트맵에 적용 되는 회전 각도 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: 90도 증분만 지원 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: 이미지에 적용 되는 회전 각도입니다.
